name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.max.slowdisks.to.exclude
description:
The number of slow disks that needs to be excluded. By default, this parameter is set to 0,
    which disables excluding slow disk when choosing volume.

name: dfs.namenode.num.checkpoints.retained
description:
The number of image checkpoint files (fsimage_*) that will be retained by
  the NameNode and Secondary NameNode in their storage directories. All edit
  logs (stored on edits_* files) necessary to recover an up-to-date namespace from the oldest retained
  checkpoint will also be retained.

name: dfs.namenode.resource.checked.volumes.minimum
description: The minimum number of redundant NameNode storage volumes required.

name: fs.s3a.socket.send.buffer
description: Socket send buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.

name: dfs.namenode.retrycache.expirytime.millis
description: The time for which retry cache entries are retained.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-xattrs-per-inode
description: Maximum number of extended attributes per inode.
